EmailTemplate.name: US Bank Weekly Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName} check out these US Bank vehicles launching near you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Buyer_Name__c},
U.S Bank is launching some high-demand, late-model vehicles we think you might be interested in.
Check out the list of vehicles below - all vehicles will launch on ACV this week!
*LINK*
Please give me a call or email if you have any questions at all.
Thank you! {!Contact.Account_Owner_TM__c}
